QuestData.Title: Payback
QuestData.Description: We thought we were safe behind Leafshadow's cloaking veil.$B$B<Vindicator Kaluud wipes the blood from his face.>$B$BSomeone told the Shadow Council's forces how to disable it. We were able to hold them off at first...$B$BMost of the town was slaughtered in the attack. Please, you must avenge our fallen. Rout these invaders out from Telmor forever!
QuestData.LogDescription: Rout $1oa Shadow Council forces in Telmor.
QuestData.CompletionText: We will run from their kind no longer.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent. The shards are at last together!
